mapper.insert: INSERT INTO event_speaker (user_id, title, background, description, banner_id, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{title}, #{background}, #{description}, #{bannerId}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE event_speaker SET title = #{title}, background = #{background}, description = #{description}, banner_id = #{bannerId}, update_time = NOW() WHERE user_id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT s.id, s.user_id, u.real_name AS userName, s.title, s.background, s.description, s.banner_id, img.file_path AS bannerUrl, s.create_time, s.update_time FROM event_speaker s LEFT JOIN t_system_user u ON s.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN event_speaker_image img ON s.banner_id = img.id ORDER BY s.update_time DESC
